translations: n.（非正式）理工院校，工艺专科学校（polytechnic 的简称）；聚乙烯（polythene 的简称）；涤纶，聚酯纤维（polyester 的简称）

sentences.sentence: All-poly is probably worse than cotton-poly blends.
sentences.translation: 全聚材料比棉混纺聚要糟糕的多。

sentences.sentence: It also gave the Cal Poly researcher a brief taste of fame.
sentences.translation: 加州理工大学的学者们也因此短暂尝到了荣誉的味道。

sentences.sentence: Poly Real Estate Group co., the second largest, posted a 39 percent drop.
sentences.translation: 第二大开发商保利地产集团则宣称其下降幅度达39%。
